Parameters: int: Bitwise-or of flags @B_android#view#View#SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LOW_PROFILE_E@, @B_android#view#View#SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_HIDE_NAVIGATION_E@, and @B_android#view#View#SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN_E@. This tells you the global state of these UI visibility flags, not what your app is currently applying.
onSystemUiVisibilityChange(int).Description: Called when the status bar changes visibility because of a call to @B_android#view#View#setSystemUiVisibility_E@.

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the status bar changes visibility. This reports
